author: brusale
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the purity and duplicate calculation for SimTracksterToTrackster association in the HGCal validation. Purity should represent the fraction of SimTracksters that have a SimToReco score below a certain threshold, hence the respective histograms should be filled with only information about SimTracksters. Nevertheless, the numerators contained the reconstructed object information.

For definitions of the association metrics: https://hgcal.web.cern.ch/Validation/TracksterValidation/



#### PR validation:

Tested with workflows `24896.0` and `23234.0`.

@felicepantaleo @rovere
title: Fix purity and duplicate calculation in HGCal validation
